Hi,

This error didn't get triggered on the SuSE Enterprise Server 9 in the=

compile farm on sourceforge.net.

Guess it most just be triggered in suse =
10.1.

Best wishes,

Harry

 

Harry Moffat                                =

Subject: Re: [cantera] Installation suse 10.1



I have r=
un into this problem before.  A quick fix is to change the line
685 in Chem=
Equil.cpp from 
        scale(x, damp);
to 
        scale(x.begin(),x.end()=
,x.begin(),damp);
For some reason, the two argument scale function messes u=
p the compiler.
I've only had this problem using g++.

Karl

On Aug 9, 2006=
, at 6:31 AM, scheskis wrote:


	I am trying to install Cantera on my lapto=
p with suse 10.1
linux. The
	following error was recieved in "make"
	
	g++ =
-c ChemEquil.cpp -I. -O3 -Wall
	ChemEquil.h: In instantiation of
	`Cantera:=
:PropertyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>':
	ChemEquil.cpp:59: instantiated=
 from here

	Cantera::PropertyCalculator<C=
antera::ThermoPhase>' has virtual
	functions but non-virtual destructor
	Pr=
opertyCalculator.h: In instantiation of
	`Cantera::TemperatureCalculator<Ca=
ntera::ThermoPhase>':
	ChemEquil.cpp:327: instantiated from here
	PropertyC=
alculator.h:48: warning: `class
	Cantera::TemperatureCalculator<Cantera::Th=
ermoPhase>' has
virtual
	functions but non-virtual destructor
	PropertyCalc=
ulator.h: In instantiation of
	`Cantera::PressureCalculator<Cantera::Thermo=
Phase>':
	ChemEquil.cpp:328: instantiated from here
	PropertyCalculator.h:5=
7: warning: `class
	Cantera::PressureCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>' has =
virtual
	functions but non-virtual destructor
	PropertyCalculator.h: In ins=
tantiation of
	`Cantera::EnthalpyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>':
	ChemEq=
uil.cpp:332: instantiated from here
	PropertyCalculator.h:30: warning: `cla=
ss
	Cantera::EnthalpyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>' has virtual
	functio=
ns but non-virtual destructor
	PropertyCalculator.h: In instantiation of
	`=
Cantera::EntropyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>':
	ChemEquil.cpp:337: inst=
antiated from here
	PropertyCalculator.h:39: warning: `class
	Cantera::Entr=
opyCalculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>' has virtual
	functions but non-virtual=
 destructor
	PropertyCalculator.h: In instantiation of
	`Cantera::DensityCa=
lculator<Cantera::ThermoPhase>':
	ChemEquil.cpp:343: instantiated from here=

	PropertyCalculator.h:66: warning: `class
	Cantera::DensityCalculator<Cant=
era::ThermoPhase>' has virtual
	functions but non-virtual destructor

rtyCalculator.h: In instantiation of

ator.h:75: warning: `class

se>' has virtual

	ct::ctvector_fp, S =3D d=
ouble]':

ror: no matching function for call to
	`scale(doublereal*, doublereal*, dou=
blereal*, double&)'

irectory
`/home/sergey/src/cantera-1.6.0r2/Cantera/src'
